snippet.title: 46: Daniel Schmachtenberger - Winning Humanity's Existential Game
snippet.description:
Daniel Schmachtenberger interview on mitigating natural and human-caused existential risks and designing post-capitalist systems.

Show notes: http://futurethinkers.org/46

Listen to previous episodes with Daniel Schmachtenberger: http://futurethinkers.org/daniel
